name: restful-client
description: RESTFul api client base object. Usually use by some api client implementation.

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -t 20000 -r should-http test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 20000 -r should-http test/*.test.js

author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com>
